name: SUBMETRO
description:
A Faithful recreation to the subway surfer/temple run idea. John doe- an everyday nobody struggles each day as everyone else until on day he finds himself onto the tracks of a subway after slipping on some one’s vanilla latte. Good thing the trains are pretty slow but poor john needs to work his cardio to beat the tracks and beat the punch clock before he is late for work!

Control John with the arrow key controls and dodge trains. Coins increase your score, Meat Gives you lives, and milk cartons increase your speed!

A school project I'm kinda proud of so I'll upload here.

Its kinda loud so heads up
